title: MLB RBI Homepage UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to https://www.mlb.com/rbi
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB RBI Header
* Affiliate with RBI/Find an RBI Program Near You/Donate buttons
* Image carousel
* Program Supporters section
* Follow RBI section
* Video section
* MLB footer

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: RBI Homepage Body UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to https://www.mlb.com/rbi
custom_expected:
THEN tapping on next/previous will able the user to navigate through the images in the carousel

THEN tapping on any of the items either from Program Supporters or Follow RBI will redirect the user to the site associated with it

THEN tapping on the video from the Video section will play the video and the video player will work as expected

title: Affiliate with RBI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB RBI homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Affiliate with RBI button
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Affiliate with RBI messaging 
* First Name field
* Last Name field
* Email Address field
* Opt-in checkbox to commercial emails from MLB.com
* Phone Number field
* Organization Name field
* Organization Street Address field
* City field
* State/Province field
* Zip/Postal Code field
* Role in the Organization field
* Type of Programming field
* Current Affiliated Organization checkboxes
* Number of Organization Participants field
* Demographic Make-up field
* Organization Website field
* RBI Program checkboxes
* Additional Comments field
* reCAPTCHA
* Terms of Use and Privacy Policy messaging
* Submit button

THEN the user will be able to fill in the fields and checkboxes

THEN the user will not be able to submit the application if the any of the fields/checkboxes with an asterisk in it 

THEN the user will not be able to submit the application if any of the inputs are invalid

title: Find an RIB Near You
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB RBI homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Find an RIB Near You button
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Find an RIB Near You messaging
* Parent/Guardian First Name field
* Parent/Guardian Last Name field
* Parent/Guardian Email Address field
* Opt-in checkbox to commercial emails from MLB.com
* Parent/Guardian Birth Date Month, Date, and Year fields
* Address 1 and 2 fields
* State/Province field
* Postal/Zip Code field 
* Number of Children Registering field
* How did you hear about the program field
* reCAPTCHA
* Terms of Use and Privacy Policy messaging
* Submit button

THEN the user will be able to fill in the fields and checkboxes

THEN the user will not be able to submit the application if the any of the fields/checkboxes with an asterisk in it 

THEN the user will not be able to submit the application if any of the inputs are invalid

title: Donate
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB RBI homepage
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on Donate button
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* Donate messaging 
* First Name field
* Last Name field
* Email Address field
* Opt-in checkbox to commercial emails from MLB.com
* Phone Number field
* Address field
* City field
* State/Province field
* Zip/Postal Code field
* Sport field
* Condition of Equipment field
* Description field
* How did you hear about the program field
* reCAPTCHA
* Terms of Use and Privacy Policy messaging
* Submit button

THEN the user will be able to fill in the fields and checkboxes

THEN the user will not be able to submit the application if the any of the fields/checkboxes with an asterisk in it 

THEN the user will not be able to submit the application if any of the inputs are invalid

title: RBI Header UX/UI
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB RBI
custom_expected:
THEN the header will display the following:

* RBI logo
* RBI Benefits
* RBI Scholarship
* About RBI
* RBI World Series
* Contact Us
* USA Baseball Online Education
* USA Softball Resource Center
* MLB Profile Icon 

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

title: RBI Logo
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to any page that the MLB RBI logo is shown
custom_steps: WHEN then user taps on the RBI logo
custom_expected: THEN the user will be redirected to MLB RBI homepage

title: RBI Benefits
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB RBI
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on RBI Benefits from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will display the following:

* MLB RBI Affirmation Benefits header image
* Programming and Administrative Benefits section
* RBI Tournament Play section
* MLB Youth Events

THEN the page will be displayed complete and neat (no typographical errors, no overlapping and/or missing icons/texts)

THEN the wait time for the page to load will not be longer than 5 secs

THEN the user will be able to scroll through the page smoothly

THEN the user will be able to pinch in/out and zoom in/out of the page

THEN the users will be able to click on buttons/elements and these will work

THEN tapping on a link text with a website associated with it will redirect the user to that page

THEN tapping on an email link will redirect the user to emailing service to email that contact

title: USA Baseball Online Education & USA Softball Resource Center
custom_preconds: GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB RBI homepage
custom_steps:
[1] WHEN the user taps on USA Baseball Online Education

[2] WHEN the user taps on USA Softball Resource Center
custom_expected:
[1] THEN the user will be redirected to Sportsdev page

[2] THEN the user will be redirected to USA Softball Resource Center page

title: MLB Profile - No Account Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB RBI page

GIVEN that the user has no account logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile Icon from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the user will be redirected to MLB login page with the following:

* MLB Logo
* Username field
* Password field
* Remember Me checkbox
* Log In button 
* Need help logging in? link text
* Sign Up link text

THEN the user will be able to fill in the fields and checkboxes

THEN the user will not be able to login if any of the inputs are invalid

THEN tapping on Need help logging in? link text will display the following help links: Forgot Password, Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, and Help

THEN tapping on Sign Up link text will redirect the user to Register form

title: MLB Profile - An Account Logged In
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that the user navigated to MLB RBI

GIVEN that the user has an MLB account logged in
custom_steps: WHEN the user taps on the Profile Icon from the header
custom_expected:
THEN the page will show the following: 

* "Welcome!" messaging
* Profile icon
* Edit Profile link text
* Logout link text 

THEN tapping on Edit Profile link text will redirect the user to MLB General Account Settings page

THEN tapping on Logout link text will log out the user across MLB pages and sites
